pullRequest.title: Remove order by for subquery in set opertion clause
pullRequest.bodyText:
implemnets #3803
Support disable some unmeaningful order by clause.
The default limit of 65535 will not be disabled because of it is added at plannode, after we support spill to disk we can move this limit to analyze

nodes.bodyText: Update the document for this new variables.

maybe allow_ignore_order_by_in_subquery is more better?
set, inline view, insert can think contain subquery.

the parameter can remove.
you can decide to apply you REMOVE_SORT rule according to if order_by/sort  contain limit or offset.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -334,3 +334,7 @@ SET forward_to_master = concat('tr', 'u', 'e');
 * `rewrite_count_distinct_to_bitmap_hll`
 
     Whether to rewrite count distinct queries of bitmap and HLL types as bitmap_union_count and hll_union_agg.
+
+* `allow_ignore_order_by`
+   Used to ignore order by w/o limit and offset in inline views, set operands and insert statements.

commit.message: order by w/o limit and offset in inline views, set operands and insert statements
